definition: to be dispersed/to break down/to fester/to ulcerate

sentences.english: The extent and consequences of the harm often more serious than the dam break.
sentences.chinese: 其所造成危害程度和后果比水库溃坝严重。

sentences.english: The basic characteristics of bore and dam break wave are analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了溃坝波和涌潮等波动的基本特征。

sentences.english: Dam-bursting, strictly speaking, is a problem of non-continuous flood wave.
sentences.chinese: 溃坝问题，严格来讲，是一种不连续洪水波问题。

sentences.english: Seepage risk is also obvious in dam-break risk except overtopping.
sentences.chinese: 溃坝险情中除漫顶外，渗流险情也较为突出。

sentences.english: The dam breaking wave was calculated.
The paper discusses the application of Finite Volume Method with the sample of one-dimensional flat-bottom dam breaking.
sentences.chinese: 以一维平底溃坝问题为例，讨论了有限体积法的应用。

sentences.english: The numerical solution of the two dimensional dam break waves is described by a discrete-velocity model.
sentences.chinese: 采用离散速度模型计算二维溃坝波问题。

definition: (of a watercourse) to breach its banks/(of a dam) to burst
to collapse (of building, dam or bridge)
